predicate.note: Frames file for 'munch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'eat'.

example.name: business casual?
example.text: *trace* Munching pizza when they could and yelling until their voices gave out, the two Benjamin Jacobson specialists at the Big Board's UAL trading post yesterday presided over what can only be described as a financial free-for-all.
example.arg: *trace* -> the two Benjamin Jacobson specialists at the Big Board's UAL trading post
